resources.string: App, where everybody can get or share any advise.
To create a new article, click on the float button in the lower right corner.
Enter your articles name and text,choose one or many mandatory tags and click on the button in the upper right corner.
To see all comments, click on the comments image left under the text of the article.
To post a comment, type the comment text and click on the send button.
To check your notifications, click on the "Notifications" in the navigation menu.
To see the response, click on the notification message. To clear all notifications, click on the button in the upper right corner.
To sign in, enter your username and password, or sign up.
